mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sign s, sign_content sc WHERE (s.sg_num = sc.sg_num AND sc.sgfc_id = 'title') AND s.sg_num IN ( SELECT DISTINCT s.sg_num FROM sign s, sign_line sl WHERE s.sg_num = sl.sg_num AND s.m_id = #{m_id} AND (sl.sgl_type = 1 AND sl.sgl_status = 0) ) ORDER BY s.sg_num desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sign s, sign_content sc WHERE (s.sg_num = sc.sg_num AND sc.sgfc_id = 'title') AND s.sg_num IN ( SELECT DISTINCT s.sg_num FROM sign s, sign_line sl WHERE s.sg_num = sl.sg_num AND (sl.m_id = #{m_id} AND sl.sgl_type = 1 AND sl.sgl_status = 0) ) ORDER BY s.sg_num desc

SELECT s.*, sf.sgf_name, m.m_name, m.dpt_code, m.pt_code, d.dpt_name, p.pt_name FROM sign s, sign_form sf, member m, department d, position p WHERE sg_num = #{sg_num} AND s.sgf_id = sf.sgf_id AND s.m_id = m.m_id AND m.dpt_code = d.dpt_code(+) AND m.pt_code = p.pt_code(+)

SELECT m.m_id, m.m_name, m.dpt_code, d.dpt_name, m.pt_code, p.pt_name FROM member m, department d, position p WHERE m.dpt_code = d.dpt_code AND m.pt_code = p.pt_code AND m.m_status = 1 ORDER BY d.dpt_name, p.pt_order

SELECT sl.*, m.m_name, m.dpt_code, d.dpt_name, m.pt_code, p.pt_name FROM sign_line sl, member m, department d, position p WHERE sg_num = #{sg_num} AND (sl.m_id = m.m_id AND m.dpt_code = d.dpt_code AND m.pt_code = p.pt_code) ORDER BY sl.sgl_order
